text: The legislation would provide $908 billion in aid and also shield businesses from coronavirus lawsuits for a few months to allow states to develop their own liability reform https://t.co/LNx3yLkbAx

name: politico
text:
The proposal includes:
• $160B in state and local aid
• $180B in additional unemployment insurance
• $288B for small businesses. I
• $82B for schools 
• $45B for transportation
• money for health care

name: politico
text:
